name: Swangman
description:
Swangman is a hangman clone made in 2 weeks for Miziziziz's Chain Letter Jam. But there's a twist—you are being hung and have one minute to form as many words as possible!

 

How To Play:

  • The up and down arrow keys extend and shorten the chain, allowing you to move up and down. 
  • A word is displayed on the bottom of the screen, along with a hint. Collect  tiles you think are a part of the word, and dodge the rest!
  • Once a word is formed, it's replaced with a harder one. Form as many words as possible before time runs out!

Notes:

  • Saving and loading high scores is currently not supported in the web build.

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).
